room_title: Escape room "The Bank" by Escape Zone 60 in Pensacola
review: We absolutely loved the Bank Heist. Can't wait to do another one!

room_title: Escape room "The Bank" by Escape Zone 60 in Pensacola
review: Awesome time! The host was terrific and explained everything very well. The bank heist is tough and teamwork is essential! I would definitely recommend this for a family group looking for something fun and challenging!

room_title: Escape room "The Bank" by Escape Zone 60 in Pensacola
review: The best things about escape rooms are the puzzles and the people. The Crime Scene Bank Robbery was my fifth escape room and I was worried that I would start to see some of the same clues and puzzles. I was extremely excited to find that all the puzzles and clues were new to me. I loved the challenge. Our host was wonderful. He had a great sense of humor and made sure we had a great time. I can't wait to go back and escape the Asylum.
